Package weka.classifiers.trees.ht

Interface LearningNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActiveHNode, InactiveHNode, NBNode, NBNodeAdaptive
public interface LearningNode
Marker interface for a node that can be updated with incoming instances in a HoeffdingTree. Implementations include ActiveHNode, NBNode and NBNodeAdaptive
